burtis.modules.passengers.model

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • burtis.modules.passengers.model.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of transaction between bus stop and bus.
    Author:
    Mikołaj Sowiński

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(Bus bus,
                   BusStop busStop,
                   Managers managers)
        Loads and unloads passengers. Calculates transaction time summing passengers that are loaded and unloaded and multiplying by constant PassengersModuleConsts.ITER_PER_PASSENGER.
        Parameters:
        bus - - bus involved with the transaction.
        busStop - - bus stop involved with the transaction.
        managers - - managers container.
